issue.title: Write hz tests for all supported .launch files

content.raw: As written, the hz tests are not 100% reliable.  They're failing sometimes when the published message fall outside the expected range.  For now, while we're running on a medium-grade EC2 machine (the one that hosts the Jenkins master), it's probably better to just widen the tolerance in the test.  Eventually we'll be running these tests on a fixed-configuration GPU-equipped machine that will be our benchmark setup.  Then we should be able to dial in the bounds pretty tightly.
content.html: As written, the hz tests are not 100% reliable. They're failing sometimes when the published message fall outside the expected range. For now, while we're running on a medium-grade EC2 machine (the one that hosts the Jenkins master), it's probably better to just widen the tolerance in the test. Eventually we'll be running these tests on a fixed-configuration GPU-equipped machine that will be our benchmark setup. Then we should be able to dial in the bounds pretty tightly.
